name: coding-brain-cli
description: Coding Brain CLI — Sovereign FSM • 16 Modes • Auditable

scripts.build: npx esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/brain.js && npx pkg dist/brain.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output dist/brain
scripts.build:win: npx esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/brain.js && npx pkg dist/brain.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/brain.exe
scripts.build:linux: npx esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/brain.js && npx pkg dist/brain.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/brain-linux
scripts.build:mac: npx esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/brain.js && npx pkg dist/brain.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/brain-macos
